roleset.name: cook in oil
roleset.note: FRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fry' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from fry.01-v predicate notes)
FRIED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on fry.01 (from fried.01-j)

example.name: oh, for context
example.text: [Mr. Burt]-1 nonetheless paid the penalty as if he had lost, [*-1]-2 agreeing [*-2]-3 to spend a day with West German Foreign Minister Hans-Dietrich Genscher [*-3] frying and selling their combined weight in potato pancakes.
example.arg: their combined weight in potato pancakes

roleset.name: burnt to a crisp, rendered unusable

example.name: arg1
example.text: ... and then come to dinner , if that was n't clear from my last text haha ... only 1030 and my brain 's already fried ..
